name: Spring Planting Planner (By Last Frost Date)
description: Generate indoor start, transplant, and direct sow dates based on your last frost.

name: Fall Planting Planner (By First Frost Date)
description: Plan fall planting and harvest timing before your first frost.

name: Frost Date Finder (ZIP / Postal Code)
description: Look up average last and first frost dates to prefill the planners.
